markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6219) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 180 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Oracle](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=233)

**Prerequisites**
[Oracle Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6217)

</column>

---

You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. When you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the oracle archetype, add a common divine spell or another divine spell you have learned or discovered (including the granted spells associated with your mystery) to your repertoire, of that spell rank.

<title level="2">Basic Oracle Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6223), [Mysterious Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=6222)
name: Basic Oracle Spellcasting
